message: Let's divide fairly, 60% for me, 40% for you. We both get a good share, and we avoid losing value due to inflation.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering the inflation effect.  It gives you a good share while still being reasonable for me.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer was generous. I'll adjust it slightly to 58% for me, 42% for you. It's still a good deal for both.
